com.teaminternational.coe.utils.report.zapi

Class JwtGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teaminternational.coe.utils.report.zapi.JwtGenerator

  • public class JwtGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for generating JSON Web Token Generated token used in Zephyr integration in class ZAPIManager
    Version:
    1.0 01/10/18
    Author:
    Vladyslav.Yegorov@teaminternational.com
    See Also:
    ZAPIManager
